function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Decline in national economy leads to reduced job opportunities for contractors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Labor shortage and delay in materials supply due to covid-19 impact","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 impacting the construction industry globally","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension and reduction of construction projects leading to loss of income for contractors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions in the supply chain and labor shortage affecting contractor productivity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High and frequent fluctuations in the overall economy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic decline due to pandemic impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear sop for workforce management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Seriousness of the covid-19 outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slowdown or stoppage of developments due to financial constraints","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High level of debt and low cash reserves for construction companies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Labor shortage and material supply chain disruptions","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contractual ambiguity regarding contractors’ entitlements during a virus outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial impact on contractors due to delay in projects and economic instability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear sop guidelines from the authority","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty due to government instruction changes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complicated workforce management on mega projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Labor-intensive industry leading to high worker costs for compliance with sop","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain and changing situation leading to difficulty in estimating costs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legal costs and unexpected additional costs due to sop compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 impacts construction projects, leading to financial and productivity problems for contractors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thematic analysis of qualitative data may not fully capture the complexity and nuances of the construction industry’s challenges during a pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data collection involving phone interviews may lead to incomplete or biased information due to the absence of face-to-face interaction.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sampling control may be ineffective, leading to a biased representation of contractors nationwide.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited sample size of 20 interviews may not capture the full range of perspectives and experiences in the construction industry.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in construction sites due to lack of preventive measures","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial strain on construction industry leading to project termination","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective communication and coordination among industry players","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of beta-diversity metric choice on research results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of quantitative taxonomy-based canberra distance metric without appropriate validation or justification.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Correlations between environmental variables and ordination axes indicating potential environmental factors influencing microbiome composition.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential contamination of sequencing data by environmental dna or other contaminants during sample preparation and processing.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misinterpretation of sequencing data due to errors in sequence processing and analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient sampling depth and rarefaction leading to biased estimates of microbial diversity and composition.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sequencing bacterial communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding how building design influences indoor microbiome","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in indoor bacterial communities based on building design choices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding how different building functions and space types influence indoor microbiome","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear relative importance of different sources of indoor microbes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases through the built environment microbiome","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the link between design and the microbiology of the indoor environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited research focused on biological processes shaping indoor ecosystems and their impact on human health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited generalization due to survey conduct in only one location cyprus .","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of prior research on tendency and awareness towards fake news.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unexplored social media use of recovered covid-19 cases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difference in social media use during covid-19 compared to normal times.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of fake news and misinformation on social media during the pandemic leading to increased anxiety and panic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased impact of decision-making based on social media discussions, leading to potential resistance to official decisions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Motivated by collectivist interests, social media use during the pandemic differs from normal times, focusing on survival and shared concerns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exaggerated panic related to covid-19 due to social media posts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
